results.title: Metformin revert insulin-induced oxaliplatin resistance by activating mitochondrial apoptosis pathway in human colon cancer HCT116 cells
results.text_hl: These results further revealed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ facilitated @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial@@@ apoptosis and enhanced @CHEMICAL_Oxaliplatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077150 @@@oxaliplatin@@@ sensitivity in @CELLLINE_CVCL:0291 @@@HCT116@@@ cells.

results.title: Metformin promotes mitophagy in mononuclear cells: a potential in vitro model for unraveling metformin's mechanism of action.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-induced mitophagy may improve cellular function, including in beta cells, by restoring normal mitochondrial phenotype, which may prove beneficial in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@ and other @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial-related diseases@@@.

results.title: Heightened sensitivity to adverse effects of metformin in mtDNA mutant patient cells.
results.text_hl: Despite its common use, the safety of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with primary @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial disease@@@ remains uncertain, as both @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial dysfunction@@@ increase the risk of @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Ryytty S, Nurminen K, Mäkinen P, Suomalainen A, Hämäläinen RH. Heightened sensitivity to adverse effects of metformin in mtDNA mutant patient cells. Life Sci. 2025 Feb 19;366-367():123486. PMID: 39978587
